participant_1.background:
I enjoy listening to Nirvana in my spare time.
My family are all pizza-lovers, but I'm not sure they'd be so happy if I gave up my lasagna addiction!
My parents have always been supportive of my career choices.
I am a multilingual and well-travelled individual who is always looking for new challenges.
I am happy with my parents.

participant_2.background:
I play soccer on the weekends to keep myself active and to have some fun.
i haven t had luck with finding a job.
i like gardening.
I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren.
i spend an hour getting ready in the morning.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just getting ready for work. What about you?
Not much. I'm just listening to some music and relaxing before I start my day.
Nice, what are you listening to?
I'm listening to some Nirvana. They're one of my favorite bands.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a grunge band from the 90s. They're pretty good. You should check them out sometime.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What do you do for fun?
I like to play soccer, garden, and watch horror movies.
That sounds like fun. I like to garden too. I don't watch a lot of horror movies, but I do like them.
Yeah, they're not for everyone. But I love the suspense and the scares.
I can understand that. I like the way they can make you feel so scared.
Exactly! It's a great feeling.
So, what's your favorite horror movie?
That's a tough one. I have a lot of favorites. But I think I'd have to say The Conjuring.
Oh, I've seen that one! It was really good.
It was! I loved the way they built up the suspense.
Yeah, that was really good. I love how they made you feel like you were actually there.
Me too! That's what makes a good horror movie, in my opinion.
I agree. So, what are you doing after work?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go watch another movie.
That sounds like a good plan. I might do the same thing.
Cool. Maybe we'll run into each other at the movies.
That would be fun.
Well, I should probably get going. Have a good night!
You too
